attributes.action: Give the UK a Referendum On the Lisbon Treaty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That the government promised the citizens of the UK a Referendum on the Lisbon Treaty. We now ask the Prime Minister to make good their promise and allow the UK citizen their right to a say on the treaty

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
